On Tuesday 21 June 2005 10:16, Kent Beck wrote:
> Jason,
>
> I see what you mean. However, one of our goals in JUnit 4 was to remove the
> recursive composition of tests. 

Kent,

Could you unpack this a little? Because it sounds so completely insane
I'm sure I'm missing something - maybe terminology, maybe a missing
concept, maybe a new formulation for what composition of tests gives
you. Maybe some persistent bad habit I've acquired is blocking me.

No hurry. By the time I can use J4 I'm sure all will be made clear.

-- 
Chris "electric hedgehog" Dollin
It's called *extreme* programming, not *stupid* programming.
